profile.name: Hanahuwaida
profile.bio: Lulusan Pendidikan Informatika UNJ dengan pengalaman dalam pendidikan vokasi dan pengembangan web. Saya menggabungkan fungsionalitas dan kebutuhan pengguna dalam setiap baris kode.
profile.bio_en: A graduate of UNJ Informatics Education with experience in vocational education and web development. I combine functionality and user needs in every line of code.

web_projects.title: Skolarn
web_projects.description: Website profil sekolah yang menampilkan informasi akademik seperti berita, pengumuman, data guru, dan struktur kelas, dengan sistem pengelolaan melalui dashboard admin.
web_projects.description_en: A school profile website that presents academic information such as news, announcements, teacher data, and class structure, managed through an admin dashboard.

web_projects.title: Perpus Digital
web_projects.description: Aplikasi perpustakaan digital sederhana berbasis Laravel yang digunakan untuk mencontohkan implementasi CRUD dan alur kerja aplikasi web kepada siswa.
web_projects.description_en: A simple Laravel-based digital library application designed to demonstrate CRUD implementation and basic web application workflows.

web_projects.title: VA-Chatbot
web_projects.description: Chatbot sederhana untuk membantu pencarian nomor Virtual Account (VA) pembayaran siswa berdasarkan dataset kelas tertentu.
web_projects.description_en: A simple chatbot that helps retrieve student payment Virtual Account (VA) numbers based on a specific class dataset.

creative_categories.title: Desain Grafis
creative_categories.description: Poster, Banner, dan Konten Sosial Media untuk berbagai event.
creative_categories.description_en: Posters, Banners, and Social Media Content for various events.

creative_categories.title: Media Presentasi
creative_categories.description: Desain Slide PowerPoint interaktif untuk keperluan mengajar.
creative_categories.description_en: Interactive PowerPoint Slide designs for teaching purposes.

creative_categories.title: Modul Ajar
creative_categories.description: Penyusunan Modul Ajar dan Job Sheet praktikum siswa SMK.
creative_categories.description_en: Preparation of Teaching Modules and Job Sheets for vocational high school students' practicum.

uiux.title: Redesign App E-Learning
uiux.desc: Studi kasus UX dan High-Fidelity Design.
uiux.desc_en: UX study case and High-Fidelity Design.

ppt.title: Dasar Algoritma
ppt.desc_en: Interactive slides for programming logic material.

modul.title: Modul Pemrograman Web
modul.desc_en: Teaching materials for 10th-grade vocational high school.
